lines.text: Picture if you will, an all-American family, the Osbornes. Husband Bob, wife Helen, son Dale, and daughter Sheri, about to be drawn into the inescapable grasp of soap and sitcom with no reprieve in sight. Where platonic relationships burrow their way into lust filled erotica... and Daddy doesn't know.
And so passes another day in the life of the Osbornes. Another journey ended but not complete. For yet in tomorrow's horoscope lies the euphoric saga of what Daddy does know.
